System_SLED_001.speaker: UI
System_SLED_001.text:
The game was unable to save successfully.
Try again?

System_SLED_002.speaker: UI
System_SLED_002.text:
The game was unable to load successfully.
Try again?

System_SLED_003.speaker: UI
System_SLED_003.text:
The game was unable to load successfully.
Try again?

If you choose to cancel, the game will create new system data instead.

System_SLED_004.speaker: UI
System_SLED_004.text:
The game was unable to save successfully.
Attempting to save again...

System_SLED_005.speaker: UI
System_SLED_005.text:
The game was unable to save successfully.
Try again?

If you choose to cancel, the game will resume without saving.

System_SLED_006.speaker: UI
System_SLED_006.text:
Are you sure you want to continue the game without saving?

Or would you rather save your data?

System_SLED_007.speaker: UI
System_SLED_007.text:
The game was unable to save successfully.
Game completion data will not be recorded if this process is unsuccessful.

Attempt to save again?

System_SLED_008.speaker: UI
System_SLED_008.text:
Are you sure you want to continue the game without saving? Game completion data will not be saved. 

Or would you rather save your data?

System_CL01.speaker: UI
System_CL01.text:
You can back up save data from your device to the cloud,
or copy save data from the cloud to your device.

Do you want to view your cloud save data?

System_CL_Btn02.speaker: UI
System_CL_Btn02.text: Cancel and Return to Title Screen

System_CL02.speaker: UI
System_CL02.text:
Save data from <arg 0> is backed up on the cloud.
What will you do with this data?

System_CL03.speaker: UI
System_CL03.text: Back up your device's save data to the cloud?

System_CL04.speaker: UI
System_CL04.text: Restore the save data on the cloud to your device?

System_CL05.speaker: UI
System_CL05.text: Save data back up in progress.

System_CL07.speaker: UI
System_CL07.text: The backup creation process is complete.

System_CL08.speaker: UI
System_CL08.text: The save data restoration process is complete.

System_CL09.speaker: UI
System_CL09.text:
No save data could be found in the cloud.
Do you want to back up new save data?

System_CL10.speaker: UI
System_CL10.text:
The save data in the cloud is corrupt.
Do you want to back up new save data?

System_CL11.speaker: UI
System_CL11.text:
Failed to prepare the backup.
Please check your device's remaining storage space.

System_CL12.speaker: UI
System_CL12.text:
Failed to unpack save data.
Please check your device's remaining storage space.

System_CL13.speaker: UI
System_CL13.text:
Failed to communicate with the cloud.
Please check your connection.

System_CL14.speaker: UI
System_CL14.text:
Failed to back up save data to the cloud.
Please check your connection and remaining cloud storage space.

System_CL15.speaker: UI
System_CL15.text:
Failed to check the save data on the cloud.
Please check your connection and remaining cloud storage space.

System_CL16.speaker: UI
System_CL16.text:
iCloud has been disabled and cannot be used.
Please check your iCloud settings.

System_CL17.speaker: UI
System_CL17.text: Accessing the cloud requires granting this game access to your contacts so your account information can be accessed.

System_CL18.speaker: UI
System_CL18.text: You haven't granted this game access to your contacts. Please open the game's settings, tap permissions, and allow access to contacts.

System_Inheriting01.speaker: UI
System_Inheriting01.text:
Saved data for the PlayStation®<voffset=0.2em>4</voffset> version of SaGa Emerald Beyond
exists in your PlayStation®<voffset=0.2em>5</voffset> console storage. Would you like to convert
this data so it can be used by the PlayStation®<voffset=0.2em>5</voffset> version of the game?

<#FF8686>All data including options and settings will be converted.
Trophy progress will not be carried over, but you can earn
trophies once more by meeting their conditions again.
The saved data for the PlayStation®<voffset=0.2em>4</voffset> version of the game
will be kept intact and remain available for use.</color>

System_Inheriting02.speaker: UI
System_Inheriting02.text:
Saved data transfer in progress.
Please don't turn off the power.

System_Inheriting04.speaker: UI
System_Inheriting04.text:
Failed to carry over saved data.

Try once more to convert your PlayStation®<voffset=0.2em>4</voffset> version of SaGa Emerald Beyond
data so it can be used in the PlayStation®<voffset=0.2em>5</voffset> version?
<#FF8686>All data including options and settings will be converted.
Trophy progress will not be carried over, but you can earn
trophies once more by meeting their conditions again.
The saved data for the PlayStation®<voffset=0.2em>4</voffset> version of the game
will be kept intact and remain available for use.</color>

System_SLED_010.speaker: UI
System_SLED_010.text: You have reached your maximum number of allowed save files. Please free up some space by deleting unnecessary saved data. Try accessing the Play Using Other Data menu from the title screen and deleting unnecessary saved data from there.

System_SLED_011.speaker: UI
System_SLED_011.text:
Failed to save game data.
The game will continue without saving.

System_SLED_012.speaker: UI
System_SLED_012.text: The saved data was corrupt and has been deleted.

System_SLED_013.speaker: UI
System_SLED_013.text: You have reached your maximum number of allowed save files. Please free up some space by deleting unnecessary saved data. Try accessing the Play Using Other Data menu from the title screen and deleting unnecessary saved data from there.

System_Demo_Inheriting01.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
System_Demo_Inheriting01.text:
Saved data from the demo version of SaGa Emerald Beyond
exists in your console storage. Would you like to carry this
data over to the full version of SaGa Emerald Beyond?

<#FF8686>All data including options and settings will be carried over.
The saved data for the demo version of the game
will be kept intact and remain available for use.</color>

System_Demo_Inheriting02.text:
Data is currently being carried over.
Do not close the game.

<#FF8686>All data including options and settings will be carried over.
The saved data for the demo version of the game
will be kept intact and remain available for use.</color>
